column1: 1250|Ten minutes to one|Ten minutes to one the fog dissolves completely and the black boys are telling Acutes to clear the floor for the meeting. All the tables are carried out of the day room to the tub room across the hallâ€”leaves the floor
column3: like we was aiming to have us a little dance.

column1: 1250|ten minutes to one|So presently Bert was sent up to the top of the house to look at a church clock which was visible therefrom
column2: and when he came down he reported that it was ten minutes to one.
